Title: Manager | Forensic Financial Crime in HCMC Office
Company: Ernst & Young Vietnam Limited (EY Vietnam)
Location: Bitexco Financial Tower, Bến Nghé, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Bitexco Financial Tower, 28th Floor, 2 Hai Trieu street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City & 8th Floor, Corner Stone Building, 16 Phan Chu Trinh, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi
Job Description:
Forensic & Integrity Services:
Our Forensic & Integrity Services leverages deep industry knowledge, and a global network to provide clients with solutions that protect business value and enhance operational integrity. In Vietnam, where the business environment is rapidly evolving, the need for our expertise is more critical than ever. Our services are designed to help organizations navigate the complex landscape of:
- Financial and non-financial misconduct,
- Regulatory compliance and
- Business disputes resolutions
- E-discovery and Expert Witness
- Financial Crime

We are committed to helping clients foster an environment of transparency and trust, ensuring that they can operate with confidence in a landscape where integrity is both a necessity and a competitive advantage. With our long-established local presence and international expertise, these position us uniquely to assist companies in the market and multinational corporations operating in the region.

We invite individuals who have energy, enthusiasm, attention to detail to join our team to develop their career in forensic accounting profession. This role is for you only if you are a highly motivated professional with excellent meticulousness.

In your role as a Financial Crime Manager, you will:
- To lead and work as part of a team to create valuable and practical insights for clients, adapting methods and practices to fit their business needs
- Provide input into the development of innovative solutions to address complex financial crime risks and issues and help clients meet global regulatory expectations
- Take responsibility for engagement planning, management, and leading teams in a variety of financial crime engagements
- Identify new client opportunities, take lead in bids and proposals and grow existing relationships
- Mentor junior staffs and provide performance feedback for members your team

We’re looking for people with the following experience:
- Functional knowledge of the ASEAN/ APAC financial crime regulatory environment
- Strong Fraud-related knowledge in financial crime sector
- AML and/or Sanctions work experience/ professional qualification preferred. Knowledge of other areas of financial crime areas would also be beneficial
- Sound technical knowledge of financial services businesses and products
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, communication, and presentation skills
- Strong stakeholder management and project management skills
- Experience of building relationships and networking to deliver financial crime engagements
- Willingness to contribute to marketing activity and developing the Financial Crime team
- A strong academic background to degree level or equivalent experience in a directly related role
- Travelling is required
Job Requirements: Mức độ phù hợp và xếp hạng của bạn so với ứng viên khác như thế nào?
Industry: Kế Toán/Kiểm Toán > Kiểm Toán
Skills: Investigation, AML, Anti-Financial Crime, Auditing, Compliance
Keyword: Kế Toán/Kiểm Toán, Kiểm Toán, Kế toán/Kiểm toán, Investigation, AML, Anti-Financial Crime, Auditing, Compliance, Ernst & Young Vietnam Limited (EY Vietnam), Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Giám Đốc Trung Tâm Kinh Doanh Chứng Khoán
Company: Công Ty Chứng Khoán Yuanta Việt Nam
Location: Tầng G và Tầng 2A, Tòa Nhà Coninco Building, Số 4 Phố Tôn Thất Tùng, Phường Kim Liên, Thành Phố Hà Nội, Tầng 4, Tòa Nhà Saigon Centre, 65 Lê Lợi, Quận 1, TP. HCM
Job Description:
1. Triển khai chiến lược phát triển TTKD, triển khai kế hoạch kinh doanh (đã được phê duyệt) tại TTKD để thực hiện phù hợp với chiến lược phát triển của Công ty.
2. Xây dựng và triển khai kế hoạch tăng trưởng thị phần, phát triển khách hàng, sản phẩm dịch vụ, nhân sự tại TTKD nhằm đạt mục tiêu kinh doanh của TTKD.
3. Quản lý, điều hành, theo dõi và giám sát các hoạt động hàng ngày tại TTKD nhằm thực hiện kế hoạch kinh doanh của TTKD và tuân thủ pháp luật.
4. Tuyển dụng, quản lý, đào tạo nhân sự nhằm phát triển đội ngũ môi giới tại TTKD.
5. Xác định khách hàng mục tiêu, phân loại khách hàng của TTKD nhằm chăm sóc tốt khách hàng hiện tại và phát triển khách hàng mới.
6. Đề xuất cải thiện chính sách khách hàng/sản phẩm mới nhằm góp phần tăng tính cạnh tranh và nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ tư vấn cho khách hàng, thu hút thêm khách hàng mới.
7. Báo cáo tình hình hoạt động của TTKD theo định kỳ (tuần, tháng, năm) hoặc bất thường cho Ban lãnh đạo.
8. Triển khai các hoạt động teamwork, trao đổi chia sẻ và đóng góp ý kiến giữa các môi giới, giữa các phòng trong nội bộ TTKD nhằm xây dựng môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, phù hợp với văn hóa của công ty.
9. Chủ động phối hợp với các bộ phận kinh doanh trong công ty như IB bán các sản phẩm chéo nhằm góp phần thúc đẩy tăng trưởng doanh số sản phẩm cho các bộ phận kinh doanh.

Responsible for managing and operating, maintaining the power system of the IP (includes 110kV substation and 22kV grid) and implementing the involved procedures, performing related work with EVN to provide the best electric service to customers in IP.

Major Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Coordinate with Project Management Dept. with the role of professional consultant, designation in the construction of the power system (110kV substation and 22kV distribution system) as a part of the technical infrastructure of IP.

2. Manage and supervise related departments, service companies and contractors to operate, maintain, repair and troubleshoot 110kV substations and 22kV distribution power systems in industrial parks.

2.1. 110kV Substation
- Supervising the operational company, scheduling maintenance and troubleshooting units during the operation of 110kV substations to meet the power supply requirements in the industrial park;
- Implement procedures related to 110kV station operation with EVN such as: registration of working power cut, the plan of operation, schedule report to EVN…

Title: Electrical Engineer (110Kv Substation)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Đô Thị Amata Hạ Long
Location: Khu Công nghiệp Sông Khoai, Xã Sông Khoai, Thị xã Quảng Yên, Quảng Ninh, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Hai Phong, Khu Công nghiệp Sông Khoai, Phường Hiệp Hòa, Tỉnh Quảng Ninh
Job Description:
Scope of work: Operate, maintenance and troubleshooting of electrical problems for the electrical system in the industrial park (at Quang Ninh) to ensure the safe, continuous, and efficient operation of the power supply system:

1. Operation:
- Develop, review operation procedure base on goverment regulation & OEM manual.
- Coordinate with oursoucing team to perform the daily operation activities on the 110/22KV Substation, supervise the daily operation, equipment routine checking to make sure the regulation, procedure compliance of operation activities.
- Coordinate with outsourcing team to grasp the EVN communicated information, dispatch order to to ensure the operation coordinated procedure between 110KV and EVN (A1, B5) is complied.
- Daily supervise to ensure Substation equipment parameter within the operating window, power quantity & quality to customers.
- Close communicate with 22KV Distribution engineer to clear understand power supply situation and customer’s demand and make the operation plan accordingly.
- Make the power demand to registe to EVN as regulation.
- Develop the fault scenarios of equipment in Substation and prepare the instructions how to response to isolate fault point, recover the power to industrial park.
- For the new project (Transformer): support, consult with project team to the design, construction phase to comply with regulation and increase reliability and safety of system coordinate to implement the commisioning system, metering installation, relay coordination to ensure that satisfy technical requirement to put system into service, monitor new system and and raise the guanrantee issue if any.
- Research and propose improvements on equipment and systems, operation mode to ensure reliable operation of the power system.

2. Maintenance:
- Make and implement the preventive maintenance, statutory maintenance, inspection plan (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly) to increase the reliability, minimize breakdown, interrupted power supply to customers.
- Close coordinate with EVN to grasp EVN’s schedule and Industrial Park’s power consumption schedule to register with EVN and make maintenance plan accordingly.
- For beakdown maintenance: coordinate with superior, outsourcing team, customer to troubleshoot, recover power supply to customer, Roots cause analysis, action plan to improve power supply reliability & safety. (Phone contact continuously 24/24, ready go to site if required).
- Supervise and manage routine, unroutine maintenance activities: coordinate with contractors and parties effectively to perform maintenance work ensure the quantity, progress, quality comply the regulation, safety, prepare the report documents as required.
- Sites supervise and give instruction to workers on maintenance work with safety measures.
- Make the plan, purchase, and manage tools and spare parts.
- Comply the EVN and safety regulations.
- Other tasks assigned by Electricity Manager.
Job Requirements: Mức độ phù hợp và xếp hạng của bạn so với ứng viên khác như thế nào?
Industry: Khoa Học & Kỹ Thuật > Kỹ Thuật Điện/Điện Tử
